Constructor Detail

BouncingBallsGUI

public BouncingBallsGUI()
Constructs and initializes each of the components for this GUI window. postcondition: The primary GUI window is initialized and its animation cycle is started. algorithm: Initialize a new Stage to have a title of "Bouncing Balls", a width of 400, and a height of 400. Set the background of myStage to be either a Color or an image (GIF, JPEG, or PNG) of your choice. Set the location of myStage such that it will be centered on a 1000 x 700 screen. HINT: Use a mathematical expression to automatically calculate the appropriate x and y coordinate the upper left corner of myStage. Invoke this object's addSprites() method. Tell myStage to open its window. Tell myStage to start its animation cycle.
